title: Pillars of Eternity: Definitive Edition
body:
Pillars of Eternity: Definitive Edition


Genres/Tags: RPG, Party-based, Isometric, 3D models on 2D backgrounds
Company: Obsidian Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 15.1 GB
Repack Size: 7 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, partially interchangeable with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, partially interchangeable with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc [Single Direct Link] (Upto 100MB/s, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Pillars_Of_Eternity_Definitive_Edition-DINOByTES ISO release: din-pila.iso (16,196,970,496 bytes)
  • All updates applied, game version is v3.7.0.1280 PX1 PX2 PX4
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • FLAC bonus OST ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • The White March Parts I & II expansions included
  • Pre-order, Deadfire Pack DLC & Kickstarter Backers DLCs included: Pledge of Gaun Ring, Cloak of the Obsidian Order, Tiny Obsidian Wyrm & Space Piglet
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus content: soundtrack, wallpapers, ringtones, etc.
  • Made compatible with future GOG patches (registry patched)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 15.1 to 7~9.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes from 7-15 minutes (depending on your PC)
  • HDD space after installation: up to 27 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Language can be changed in game settings

Game Description

Pillars of Eternity: Definitive Edition features:

  • Deep character customization: Build a character as one of eleven classes such as Barbarian, Chanter, Cipher, Druid, Fighter, Monk, Paladin, Priest, Ranger, Rogue and Wizard.
  • Sculpt your own story: Side with various factions using a reputation system, where your actions and choices have far reaching consequences.
  • Explore a rich and diverse world: Beautiful pre-rendered environments laced with an engaging story and characters bring the world to life.
  • Journey to new regions and meet new companions in The White March: Parts I & II, the game’s expansion chapters, and find new stories to experience
  • All premium content originally sold with Pillars of Eternity: Royal Edition, including the original soundtrack, a digital collector’s book, an original novella set in the Pillars universe, and much, much more
  • The all-new Deadfire Pack DLC, which includes new in-game items to earn and discover, and new portraits from the forthcoming sequel, Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire, releasing in 2018

You can skip downloading of bonus content you don’t need. Here is the list of optional files:

  • fg-optional-bonus-audio.bin (OST, Audio Novella, Ringtones)
  • fg-optional-bonus-graphics.bin (Concept Art, Game Map, Wallpapers)
  • fg-optional-bonus-pdfs.bin (Almanac, Collector’s Book, Cookbook, Manual, Strategy Guide)
  • fg-optional-bonus-video.bin (“Road to Eternity” Documentary, also available here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NA8FfDskw4Q)

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT compatible with my previous repacks of this game.
